settings.title: 5 Reasons Why Simplifying Your Skincare Routine with Super Tallow Can Transform Your Skin
settings.subtitle: “One ingredient changed my skin forever – and it can do the same for you.” - Lorin B.

settings.title: 1. Super Tallow Clears Congested Skin and Reduces Breakouts
settings.content:
If you’ve struggled with acne, clogged pores, or inflammation, Super Tallow helps calm your skin and prevent future breakouts.

Its anti-inflammatory properties reduce redness and irritation, while providing essential nutrients to heal and balance your skin.

With regular use, your skin looks clearer, healthier, and more balanced.

settings.title: 2. Super Tallow Helps Heal and Restore Skin Damaged by Overusing Products
settings.content:
If you’ve overwhelmed your skin with too many products, Super Tallow can give you a reset from a lengthy, unnecessary skincare routine.

It strengthens your skin barrier, replenishes lost moisture, and supports natural cell regeneration for faster healing.

Super Tallow helps your skin bounce back stronger, smoother, and healthier than ever.

settings.title: 3. Super Tallow Balances Oil Production for Healthier Skin
settings.content:
Super Tallow provides the perfect balance of moisture, preventing your skin from producing excess oil.

It hydrates without clogging pores andensuring your skin stays fresh and hydrated throughout the day.

By mimicking your skin’s natural oils, it helps reduce breakouts caused by excessive sebum while maintaining optimal hydration.

settings.title: 4. Super Tallow Uses Only One Clean Ingredient with No Toxins
settings.content:
Super Tallow is made from 100% grass-fed beef tallow and free from chemicals, preservatives, and seed oils.

Its nutrient-rich formula nourishes your skin while protecting it from irritants found in many modern moisturizers and skin products.

No fillers, no fragrances, no harmful chemicals – just pure, simple skincare you can trust for you and your family.

settings.title: 5. Super Tallow Replaces Multiple Skincare Products in Your Routine
settings.content:
Tired of using separate products for hydration, healing, and skin protection? Super Tallow does it all with just one ingredient.

Instead of cluttering your shelf with multiple moisturizers, serums, and creams, you can simplify your skincare routine and still achieve better results.

Super Tallow saves you time, money, and hassle – giving your skin everything it needs in one jar, with one ingredient.

settings.title: The Smarter, Natural Choice for Healthier Skin
Truly Unscented – A clean, natural moisturiser with no overpowering scent.
Deep Hydration – Locks in moisture for soft, smooth, and radiant skin.
Single-Ingredient Purity – Made from 100% grass-fed beef tallow, free of additives.

settings.rev_text_1: “I have been using Super Tallow since September and my skin has never felt smoother. I love the creamy texture and the lack of a scent. I have given up chemically dense lotions in favor of this simple nutrient rich skin care solution.”

settings.ctm_description:
Made from grass-fed beef tallow, this single-ingredient moisturizer nourishes deeply, leaving your skin soft, smooth, and radiant.

Super Tallow™ Facial Moisturizer
